game.name: Deep Zone
game.desc: Classically inspired, Deep Zone immediately reminds you of Gyruss - but with its own unique twists.

game.name: Hotel Bunny
game.desc:
Hotel Bunny has the player try to get several of the nine rabbits safely to the titular hotel, located past a trial of up to three angry dogs.
Controls: Press right on the controller disc to get the bunny hopping towards the hotel. Press a top/bottom button to use carrot power. To be successful, you must time the bunny's start well, and use your carrot power wisely.

game.name: Princess Lydie
game.desc: You play as Lydie, and the objective is stomping/kicking enemies, then kick them out of the screen. There's a bonus of few extra seconds, chain/combo gains additional seconds. You'll only lose a life when running out of time
